name: Paint Roller: Color Race
description:
Show how you are accurate in Paint Roller and feel the beat around you.

We bring to you unique gameplay which is a combination of painting art and music. Each paint is each rhythm

This is a great app for relaxation and time killer when you have to wait for something.
Let's Install and play it for free!

MAIN FEATURE:
- Friendly 3D design
- Huge trending song playlist
- Simple gameplay

It's harder than you think.
Let's show me your skills with a global artist around the world.
